Class Bill

java.lang.Object
Bill
public class Bill extends Object
The Bill class represents a legislative bill in the assembly. It contains information about the bill's title, type, the MLA who proposed it, and the term during which it was proposed.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    Bill(String title, String type, MLA mla, int term)
    Constructs a Bill with the specified title, type, MLA, and term.
